name: Nowhere (2007)
description:
You play John... or Lucas. To tell you the truth you don't know well. Around you everybody looks the same, places seem void and a feeling of deja vu lingers on. With Nowhere experience a stunning and horrific adventure, full of twists.

Explore the depths of the human soul and try to unveil the mystery hidden behind Emily's door. Be quiet, avoid the strange creatures that live in the world around you, hide in the shadows and KILL only if you really need to !
